Utility.name: user
Utility.description: Displays information about a specific user.

Utility.name: roleinfo
Utility.description: Provides information about a specific role.

Utility.name: poll
Utility.description: Creates a poll for users to vote on.

Fun and Engagement.name: roll
Fun and Engagement.description: Rolls a random number between 1 and the specified number.

Leveling.name: level
Leveling.description: Displays the userâ€™s level in the server.

Leveling.name: xp
Leveling.description: Displays the user's XP in the server.

Leveling.name: leaderboard
Leveling.description: Displays the top users by level or XP.

Moderation.name: ban
Moderation.description: Bans a user from the server.

Moderation.name: kick
Moderation.description: Kicks a user from the server.

Moderation.name: mute
Moderation.description: Mutes a user for a specified duration.

Moderation.name: warn
Moderation.description: Issues a warning to a user.

Moderation.name: clear
Moderation.description: Deletes a specified number of messages from a channel.

Moderation.name: lock
Moderation.description: Locks a channel, preventing users from sending messages.

Moderation.name: addrole
Moderation.description: Adds a role to a user.

Moderation.name: removerole
Moderation.description: Removes a role from a user.

Moderation.name: purge
Moderation.description: Deletes a specified number of messages from a specific user.

Moderation.name: banlist
Moderation.description: Displays a list of banned users in the server.

Events.name: on_raw_reaction_add
Events.description: Assigns a role to a user when they react with a specific emoji in a verification channel.

Events.name: on_member_join
Events.description: Sends a welcome message to the designated welcome channel when a new member joins the server.

Events.name: on_message
Events.description: Handles experience and leveling mechanics for users based on their activity in the server.
